title: Project Dark Eye - Whitepaper v1.0
body:
## 1. Executive Summary

Project Dark Eye is a multi-phase project with planned launches of multiple NFT collections on Ethereum that form an ecosystem in the virtual world (DEYE-Universe). DEYE token is the utility token for the platform with 70% of the total supply reserved for community rewards.

The Machines is an NFT collection launching in Phase 1. The Machine holders are granted DEYE token rewards daily and guaranteed mint of all subsequent NFT collection sales.

The Commanders is an NFT collection launching in Phase 2. The Commanders is a collection of 10000+ 3D avatars with over 200 traits. Every day, the Commanders grow in stats/traits, and the Commander holders receive random loot from Commander explorations.

The Planets is an NFT collection launching in Phase 2 as one of the Commander exploration loots. All Planets are rewards for Commander holders. The launch also comes with the Base System which is the first utility of the Planets.

The Team has plans or has work in progress on more loot types, more Planet utilities and an immersive experience application.

## 2. DEYE-Universe

> *It is Year 6069. The Masters of Project Dark Eye traveled through Portal P-8371 and landed in this new universe. They abided by the Project Act and named it DEYE-Universe. Within the next 6 earth-months, they discovered the very first planet in DEYE-Universe, and completed the HQ construction and portal establishment there. Now is the time for the next phase.*

DEYE-Universe is the virtual world setting for all the Project Dark Eye experience.

## 3. DEYE Token

DEYE token will be an ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain, with a fixed total supply of 10,000,000,000.

### Reward the Community

DEYE tokens are rewarded to Project Dark Eye NFT holders on a daily basis. 70% of the total supply is allocated for the reward pool.

### Marketplace Transactions

In the Marketplace, users may spend DEYE tokens to buy items from other users and to be part of the experience built by other users.

### Transaction Fee Model

A 5% transaction fee is applied in the Marketplace. 100% of the transaction fees are added to the reward pool.

### Governance

DEYE token allows holders to participate in Governance decisions of the project, using a DAO structure. They can exercise their voting rights on key decisions like roadmap prioritization.

### Liquidity

2% of the total supply is reserved for liquidity management. The team does not plan to provide liquidity for DEYE tokens until the Marketplace launch.

![DEYE Token Allocation](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m7YT-McQBvPy4nPUjb_hy.png?height=1570&width=2622&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&size=medium)

## 4. The Machines

The Machines is the first NFT collection to be launched. This collection will be deployed on Ethereum as ERC-721 tokens. This collection is created to benefit our early supporter community. There are a total supply of 1422 Machines across 3 different tiers. The first 300 Machines minted are Gold Machines. The next 1000 Machines minted are Silver Machines. And the remaining Machines minted are Black Machines. All Machines will be sold at 0.03 ETH and our early supporters will be able to mint first.

### Benefits of holding a Machine

* Machine holders are rewarded with DEYE tokens every 24 hours.
  * Gold Machine holders are rewarded with 0.00005% of the remaining reward pool per Gold Machine held every 24 hours.
  * Silver Machine holders are rewarded with 0.00002% of the remaining reward pool per Silver Machine held every 24 hours.
  * Black Machine holders are rewarded with 0.000005% of the remaining reward pool per Black Machine held every 24 hours.
* All 1422 Machines grant holders guaranteed mint of at least one NFTs in all the subsequent projects by Project Dark Eye at a discounted price (or prioritized mint if the total supply is less than 1422). The exact numbers are decided on a per-project basis.
* Exclusive airdrops, giveaways, and events.

![Machine (Unfinalized)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eCbW8hlL4M_8arxHBHsGt.jpg?height=3500&width=3500)

## 5. The Commanders

The Commanders is a collection of 6666 3D avatars deployed on Ethereum as ERC-721 tokens. Each avatar in the collection represents a commander in DEYE-Universe. Each commander will experience different events, grow in different directions and change DEYE-Universe in a unique way.

Every 24 hours, every Commander is dispatched to an exploration, without any operations needed from the owner address. Through each exploration, Commanders gain experience, grow in different traits, and receive loot (items, equipment, planets) from battles and discoveries. On a daily basis, the Commander NFTs have their stats/traits updated and the holders are rewarded with the loot NFTs.

Each Commander has a unique 3D avatar, with 200+ Visual Traits in the whole collection. These Visual Traits only decide the appearance of the Commanders.

All Commanders have the same starting Ability Traits. The Ability Traits grow through daily explorations, and the daily exploration results are impacted by the Ability Traits. Project Dark Eye Team is committed to make it equal across all Commanders in terms of the utility.

Commander NFT holders are also rewarded with a portion of the remaining reward pool every 24 hours. The exact portion number will be announced once the total supply of the Commanders is finalized.

![Commander (Unfinalized)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YNRoqlydBWYJjbnU8Fd_3.png?height=1233&width=1233)

## 6. The Planets

Planet is the “Land” equivalent in DEYE-Universe. Planet #0 is where the Project Dark Eye HQ is at and is owned by Project Dark Eye Team. 100% of the remaining Planet supply will be rewarded to the Commander holders through Commander explorations.

Each Commander has one base in one of the discovered DEYE-Universe planets. The base is where the Commander is dispatched from on daily explorations. Explorations dispatched from Planets closer to the undiscovered space in DEYE-Universe have a high chance of discovering new Planets and receiving new loot. All Commanders have base on Planet #0 at the beginning. Through the platform on our website, Planet holders are able to enable/disable their planets for re-base at a price they set, and Commander holders are able to re-base each of their Commanders to a re-base-enabled planet at the price set.

Planets have built-in utilities and customizable utilities. Base System is one of the built-in utilities. More utilities will be announced from the team.

![Planet (Unfinalized)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6NPriolf-ExdlhoOh54ix.jpg?height=1440&width=2560)

## 7. The Marketplace

There are going to be more types of loot (other than Planets) that Commander holders will receive through Commander explorations. The Marketplace will launch on our website for trading all types of loot using DEYE token. More details will be announced in the next version of the whitepaper.

## 8. The World by Project Dark Eye

The goal of this working title is to provide an immersive social experience not only for the existing NFT holders but also to the broader social media consumers. Crypto will not be a barrier for anyone to experience the World, to create personal experience, or to access any social features, but it will be the way to trade items and to trade experience. All the existing holders will get a head start in this metaverse. The first application will be an Unreal Engine PC application. Development is currently underway.

## 9. Timeline

### Phase 1 (2022 April)

* The Machines collection and the DEYE token are deployed.
* As soon as a Machine is minted, its daily DEYE token reward starts.
* The Machine holders are able to check DEYE balance and claim DEYE tokens from the website (with only gas fee).

### Phase 2 (2022 May/June)

* The Commanders collection is deployed.
* As soon as a Commander is minted, its daily DEYE token reward starts.
* Right after the Commanders minting is completed,
  * The Commander exploration starts on a daily basis. This means that the Commander holders start to receive Planets from explorations. The Commander holders are able to claim the loot NFTs from the website (with only gas fee).
  * Planet Base System launches. Planet holders are able to enable/disable the rebase feature on their planets and set a price for Commanders to rebase to the planet (with only gas fee). Commander holders are able to rebase each of their Commanders onto another discovered Planet that has the rebase feature enabled, at a price set by Planet holder (plus gas fee).

### Phase 3 (2022 June/July)

* More loot items become available to claim from explorations.
* More Planet utilities are available.
* The Marketplace launches.
* More details on Phase 3 will be revealed in the next version of the whitepaper.

### Phase 4 (2022 H2)

* The World V1 alpha testing launches. More details will be revealed in a future version of the whitepaper.

# 10. A Personal Note

I am Mas. As a founder of the project, I have always been passionate about building the very best consumer experience with innovations and leverages on the latest technology. Being in the tech world for a decade in the silicon valley, I started as a software engineer at Google where I helped build a planet-scale security platform for Google’s enterprise clients. I left Google in a few years with the mindset to change the consumer world, to build something that every single individual could enjoy. I joined as a founding engineer in a tech startup and helped build a hundreds-of-millions-of-dollar business in the space of consumer online shopping experience. Over the last few years, I have been amazed by the Crypto/NFT community, excited by the possibilities of the Web3 technologies while at the same time seeing a lack of technical capabilities in many projects. So here I am now. In 2021, I started on Project Dark Eye, with the vision to innovate, to create, to explore all the possibilities in this space with the community.

I want to personally thank you all, the community, the team and all the people around, for the support and for everything. It has been an incredible journey!

## Official Links

* Website: [ProjectDarkEye.com](https://projectdarkeye.com)
* Twitter: [@ProjectDarkEye](http://twitter.com/ProjectDarkEye)
* Discord: [discord.gg/sMuCeRFPjv](https://t.co/0e8UvJJ1AY)

title: Declaration of Mission
body:
## TABLE OF CONTENTS

X.   Introduction

 1. Summary
 2. Mission Statements
 3. What is Basketball-the-Remix?
 4. Acknowledging the Cognitive Dissonance of the Basketball Brain.
 5. What is the No Backboard Basketball League?
 6. The Basics of a No Backboard Basketball League Facility.
 7. New Sport+Facilities+Blockchain = A New Basketball Platform
 8. Tokens can unlock value and are building blocks for a new economy.
 9. Putting It All Together.
10. Where to start? Building a team, a community, and a movement.
11. Incentivized Community to Build No Backboard Basketball League
12. Three Phases to Building a NBBL Community Economy
13. The UHoopers NFT Collection

## INTRODUCTION

### It is very dangerous to go into eternity with possibilities which one has oneself prevented from becoming realities.   A possibility is a hint from God.  One must follow it."   -   Soren Kierkegaard

Thoughts are things, and ideas have weight.  That’s why some people respond to hearing a compelling idea with, “that’s heavy.”  Having a sense of purpose is to carry a heavy idea and be a vehicle for that idea to have expression in the world.

Ideas can also be magnetic, attracting other ideas.  I first conceived the idea of what today is the No Backboard Basketball League in 1998.  It wasn't until 2016, that the technology to empower the idea I wrote down in 1998 was adopted in the marketplace.

The path from 1998 to today led me to study basketball history. Then to study black basketball history, which led to me following streetball. Following streetball led to me to study the recreational basketball market within the overall basketball market.

What started out as an idea for a cool new sport and a vertical sports-entertainment business had transformed into a passion to recapture the spirit of the Negro Baseball League and basketball’s Black Five Era.  Now the goal is to create a niche basketball industry reflective of the black pioneers of basketball who laid the foundation for the sport during the first half of the 1900’s. Too create an economic ecosystem that creates opportunities for athletes, entrepreneurs, and artists and adds value to communities across the United States.

The idea of the No Backboard Basketball League has been too heavy for most.  The idea also lacked the right incentives to compel others to come along and build considering the global influence of basketball.  Millions of people benefit from the current structure of the basketball market.

Blockchain now provides the tools to reimagine business models and create micro-economies of significant sizes. Now participation in the economic activities of the No Backboard Basketball League can be engineered to provide individuals the incentives and tools to contribute to the project, and benefit from the increase in the value of the project.  Lowering the barriers to creating communities of athletes, entrepreneurs, and artists who contribute to the production of a new basketball experience for millions of fans enjoy.

This is the task at hand.  This is also your invitation to join this fantastic voyage.

MARK TEE  - Inventor of Basketball-the-Remix & Founder of the No Backboard Basketball League.

![League's Formal Seal. Center:  Original Logo, hand drawn designed by MARK TEE.  Middle Ring:  First game was played December 5, 2004. Outer Ring:  The League's Why.](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/B9aK0BP2p4PRkxzZ1rYjn.jpg?height=3232&width=3292)

## SUMMARY

This document is a clarion call to anyone and everyone who is open ***to the existence*** of a new basketball sport and would work to help establish a new basketball sport if properly incentivized.

The No Backboard Basketball League is an extremely ambitious project.  I want to start the first real-world sport launched, developed, and sustained with blockchain technologies.  In the process building a niche, multi-billion dollar tokenized economy that aligns the interest of fans with the interest of the League.

It’s only the emergence of blockchain technologies and the many business applications in the marketplace today that make the concepts and ideas expressed within possible. Blockchain is empowering the transformation of markets into economic communities.  New business models are emerging that will allow brands to unlock a tremendous amount of value from customers and fans.

This is a project that over the next 10 years will cost hundreds of millions of dollars.  For that investment the goal is to build a vibrant and dynamic tokenized economy that includes tens of thousands of employees, athletes, and businesses serving a global audience of 100 million fans or approximately 5% of the current global basketball fanbase.

We launch people into the earth's outer orbit and tossing bean bags into little holes is a multi-million-dollar sport that is broadcasted on national networks.  It’s not the idea but the “will to do.”

It's my desire that after reading this declaration of mission, you are inspired to join this fantastic voyage at a level that’s comfortable for you.

## MISSION STATEMENT OF THE NO BACKBOARD BASKETBALL LEAGUE

“Is to establish a network of No Backboard Basketball League facilities that leverage blockchain technologies to enable the creation, development, and sustaining of a global tokenized No Backboard Basketball League economy that unlocks the athletic, the entrepreneurial, and the artistic value trapped in black and brown communities across the United States through empowering teenagers and young adults with the means to create new businesses and create new forms of wealth.”

## VISION STATEMENT

The No Backboard Basketball League is the first basketball sport in the real-world launched, developed, and sustained using Blockchain technologies to create a fully integrated tokenized economy that aligns the interest of the Business, Owners, Athletes, and Fans to create a self-sustaining recreational basketball economic ecosystem.

![Screen shot from 2011](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yuu8qtVNVvSghiBuuOtM6.PNG?height=645&width=869)

## So What is Basketball-the-Remix?

Basketball-the-Remix is an alternative basketball sport referred to as,” the modern interpretation of the original game.” Based upon the concepts in a United States Patent for a Basketball Sport, Apparatus, and Method of Play, this new sport is inspired by Dr. James Naismith’s original intent on how basketball should be played.

Basketball-the-Remix is a 3x3 full court basketball sport that uses UHoops instead of baskets with backboards and is played on a smaller 70’ x 50’ court. UHoops are set at 10’ in height, are two inches smaller than basketball baskets at 16” in diameter with no backboard. A UHoop is placed at each end of the court and extends four feet from the baseline over an area called the 3 Point Key.  This arrangement of the UHoop and the court provides 360 degrees of access, opening an additional 200 sq. ft. of direct access to the hoop. The 3-point line is set at 22’, and the Free Shot Line is set at 15’ just like basketball.

The game incorporates elements of multiple sports including soccer and hockey to create a faster, more challenging game of basketball. Some of the most notable rules of basketball-the-remix are:

●     No Time Outs.

●     Position of the ball determines out of play and dead ball, not the player (Soccer).

●     Substitutions are made during live play only (Hockey).

●     Ball is live immediately after shots are made.  No taking the ball out.

●     3 Point Key and Goal Tending.  The 3 Point Key underneath the UHoops is shorter and wider than a traditional basketball key.  Hoops made within the Key are worth 3 points.  Shots attempts within the 3-point key can be goaltended.

## Basketball-the-Remix and Social Proof at the Micro-Level

In full transparency, to date, all no backboard basketball events have been self-produced and have been grassroots in nature. I have produced no backboard events intermittently between 2005 and 2021.

Over one hundred athletes have participated in some version of no backboard basketball through events I have produced.  Regardless of the equipment or facility, regardless of skill set and experience, regardless of if they hooped or watched, everyone has always had a great experience. Most athletes express a desire to have regular access to play no backboard basketball.  It's common to have an athlete follow-up with a testimony of how well they played “basketball,” especially shooting the ball after playing no backboard basketball.

I have hours of video that validate these statements.  More importantly, I have hours of videos showing athletes of various ages, skill levels, and experience engaged, competing, and enjoying playing basketball with no backboards.

In February of 2021, I was contracted with the basketball apparel lifestyle brand Hoop Culture. In my role I was able to survey a group of 340 affiliates of the brand.  When asked “would you subscribe to a social media channel promoting people playing  basketball without a backboard?”  An overwhelming 95% of respondents replied yes or maybe.

With 52% of respondents having already heard of playing basketball without a backboard prior to the survey, when asked, “if given the opportunity, would you try to play basketball without backboards?,” the majority or 82.6% said yes.

Interviews of athletes who have participated in the recent proof-of-concept events for the No Backboard Basketball League are available on [www.nobackboard.com](https://www.nobackboard.com) .

![In 2021, The Overtime Network syndicated a clip of basketball-the-remix across its network.  This is a visual recap of the clips reach on the Overtime Network](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/F-6-0ep3heW3--FadPcjS.jpg?height=540&width=960)

## Acknowledging the Cognitive Dissonance of the Basketball Brain:

**The unconscious mental bias towards the backboard in basketball.**

Fair- and open-minded people who know the game of basketball immediately see the inherent value of playing no backboard basketball.  These people self-identify themselves immediately upon seeing or hearing of the concept of Basketball-the-Remix.  They identify themselves with statements like, “your jumper must be wet to shoot on that hoop!” or “shooting on that hoop will get your jumper tight!”

On one side of people’s basketball brain, people recognize innate benefits of both training on the UHoops and playing basketball-the-remix.  These statements are documented and validated by video testimony of individuals who have participated in basketball-the-remix proof-of-concept events over the years.  Participants realize that basketball-the-remix is a better sport, because they experienced a higher level of performance playing traditional basketball after playing basketball-the-remix.  Most open-minded observers of basketball-the-remix events deduct the same conclusion without having to play the game.  Most comments on social media also recognize the benefits of playing without a backboard.  With many commenting they had experienced playing on milk crates or Netball baskets.

![Social Media Post ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/D6sXbynRSSbYnnpzXn7m9.JPG?height=590&width=488)

On the other side of the basketball brain, the NBA’s entertainment engine, influence, and reach owns so much mental real-estate in the minds of the public that most people think the NBA and basketball are one in the same.   With the NBA as the titan and standard bearer for the global basketball industry, by default so is playing basketball with a backboard.

When you add the extremely long list of defunct basketball leagues over the decades, the idea of a "new basketball league” is usually dead on arrival in most people’s minds.  Mental strike number two.

A more insightful consideration is that the NBA directly or indirectly influences a vast network of people, organizations, and resources that extends globally, all the way down to grassroots basketball.  This influence impacts people's ability to objectively process the idea of building a new, niche basketball industry around no backboard basketball. This builds a David and Goliath scenario in the minds of most people.

### Observing the Mental Tension

Years ago, an executive for a major shoe company provided me with some constructive feedback.  The message was, “great concept, but you are disrupting the apple cart.  Too many people are eating off basketball with a backboard.”

In my initial conversations with capital, I would witness the mental tension of acknowledging a great idea while simultaneously acknowledging their bias for basketball and the size of the task at hand.  Ultimately, this results in suggestions to “support basketball” through the selling of training hoops without ever grasping the multi-billion-dollar opportunity presented.

![Clip syndicated over the Overtime Network ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/ICySu99wZGY34Nn8Y4JKK.JPG?height=828&width=615)

## WHAT IS THE NO BACKBOARD BASKETBALL LEAGUE?

At this moment of writing the No Backboard Basketball League is a new recreational basketball platform in development.  Like how FIBA 3x3 and Hoop-it-Hoop are recreational basketball platforms that makes competitive 3x3 basketball available to the public, the No Backboard Basketball League is a recreational basketball platform that makes the sport basketball-the-remix available to the public.

The No Backboard Basketball League will provide the world’s best recreational basketball experience to as many families as possible. The No Backboard Basketball League will provide world’s best basketball training, the world’s best club basketball programs, the world’s best recreational basketball competitions, and the world’s best basketball entertainment.

### The plan to manifest this vision is to establish a network of one hundred No Backboard Basketball League Smart Facilities in ten regions across the United States.

## THE BASICS OF A NO BACKBOARD BASKETBALL LEAGUE FACILITY

Each facility will be 25,000 sq. ft., with four No Backboard Basketball Courts, including one Stadium Court.  Leveraging a partial two-story facility model, 12,000 sq. ft. will be used for UHoop shooting bays, media production, fitness training, recovery center, classrooms, locker rooms, and store.  Basic services offered will include:

●     Shooting Training on UHoops, including Shooting Bay rentals

●     Skills Training on UHoops.

●     Club Basketball Teams including Facility DAO Sponsored Teams.

●     Recreational No Backboard Basketball Leagues.

●     Media Production and Distribution.  Facility specific programming with daily creation and distribution.

●     Integration with a blockchain-empowered media platform and blockchain wallet that manages the various tokens that powers participation within the No Backboard Basketball League ecosystem.

**Ownership of each facility will be a combination of:**

●     The No Backboard Basketball League.

●     A Master DAO.  The umbrella DAO that works with No Backboard Basketball to build and manage the NBBL Facilities Network.

●     A Facility and Team DAOs.  Facility specific DAOs that roll-up to the Master DAO.  Maintain decision making for specific facility and the facility sponsored teams.  League and Master DAO hold veto power.

●     Holders of fractionalized Facility NFTs purchased in the Marketplace.

●     Residential properties in each of the facilities neighborhoods that have been assigned ownership through a Neighborhood Token.

![Prototype UHoops.  Sixteen inches in diameter, two inches smaller than standard baskets. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JxvTOSKX03OQdw6KWQCJA.jpg?height=1928&width=3095)

## New Sport + Network of Facilities + Blockchain

### A New Basketball Platform Designed for Real World, Digital, and Economic Disruption

Basketball was invented in the YMCA.  The YMCA’s network of facilities was the platform that enabled the rapid expansion and popularity of basketball.  The Health and Fitness industry in the United States expects boutique fitness services to add 2,000 facilities within the next 5 years.  Specialized boutique fitness franchises had been driving the force behind the growth of the Health & Fitness industry prior to the pandemic.

After 10 years in business, the basketball facility franchisor Pick-Up USA has seen an increase in the franchising of their basketball facilities.  Today, the trend in grassroots and youth basketball is that those who can build their own basketball facility, will build their own basketball facility.  The pandemic proved that businesses that rely on public or semi-public facilities to operate their businesses are vulnerable.

![MARK TEE with a set of prototype UHoops. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/DBupurriWuQznCR8AmnpC.jpg?height=2250&width=4000)

The synergy of a new, faster, more challenging basketball sport offered to communities across the country through a network of facilities supported by a blockchain-powered marketplace can unlock value in these communities that currently lies dormant and untapped.

The emergences of blockchain technologies has created a new set of tools that the Backboard Basketball League can leverage to:

○     Unlock the value of each facility to members of the community the facility serves.

○     Unlock the value of content creators and content consumers.

○     Unlock the value of elite performers in the no backboard basketball league sponsored activities.

○     Unlock the value of a community economic ecosystem, the new network effect.

○     Onboard 1 million people into the Web3 economy.

![Picture of athletes participating in proof-of-concept event.  Player is shooting a free shot. ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/J4hZy2KtQnvAFHnO1UIJD.jpg?height=1080&width=1920)

## TOKENS CAN UNLOCK LATENT VALUE AND PROVIDE BUILDING BLOCKS FOR A NEW ECONOMY.

### Use a token to unlock the value of facilities to allow residents in the neighborhood of each facility to participate in the facility’s increase in value.

The No Backboard Basketball League will buy properties and build each of the first one hundred No Backboard Basketball League facilities.  Upon completion of construction and the beginning of business operations, the League will fractionalize a % of the facility into tokens. Facility Tokens.  A portion of the Facility Tokens will be sold on the open market.  Another portion of facility tokens will be assigned to selected residential properties within the neighborhood each facility serves.

These neighborhood tokens will be staked in a trust.   The management of the proceeds are dedicated to the economic empowerment of our neighbors. This assignment of value from the No Backboard Basketball League facility will run with the property, adding value to that property and provide an incentive for a positive relationship between the League and owners of properties within the facilities neighborhood.

### Use a token to unlock the value of content creators.

In June of 2000, during the pandemic, I wrote a paper entitled [The No Backboard Basketball League Blockchain Project.](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1dqdsQsNknS5GenjMjF-Zg9TA0Nax7ZJV/view?usp=sharing)  In that paper I introduce the idea of **“content minting.”**  The idea behind content minting is pushing raw, proprietary content from the League onto a blockchain-empowered media platform and enabling holders of a certain token to edit and monetize content on the blockchain-empowered media platform, with an automatic royalty paid back to the League and other interest holders in the content.

To accomplish this objective, the long term goal is to build a blockchain-empowered media platform that automates the entire content lifecycle from ingesting League content, to editing content on the platform, to minting video NFTs, to the syndication of video NFTs,  to the attribution advertising, and the payments of royalties.

![Conceptualizing a tokenized economy around the NBBL Facility Network](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rXAWz7kMBVHtQqhPlBDWY.jpg?height=720&width=1280)

### Use a token to unlock the value of competitive recreational hoopers who participate in No Backboard Basketball League sponsored activities.

Blockchain technologies allow for the fractionalization of assets and use tokens for the automation of the distribution of value generated from assets to the asset’s owners, and other holders of interest.  A proprietary video is an asset. The value of the video depends on the quality of content or IP within the video.

Here the goal is the development of a token that works within the proposed blockchain-empowered media platform.  This token enables the attribution of the hooper's participation in League created content.  This token also receives payment from the monetization of League content that features a token’s hashmark. This is a revolutionary concept that unlocks unlimited possibilities to extend NIL concepts to recreational sports at all levels.

### Unlock the value of a community economic ecosystem.

Ball is life.  This is a true statement.

Basketball has been a vehicle for personal development, advancement of social causes, a stage for legendary performances, and an economic industry for over a hundred years.

Today basketball has 2 billion fans, generates tens of billions of dollars in annual economic activity, and is an intimate part of millions of families around the globe.

Recreational basketball has been generating hundreds of millions of annual economic production for decades. The founders of AND1 sold in 2005 for an undisclosed amount after revenues had peaked at $250 million dollars a year earlier.  Here’s the most important fact to the AND1 success story.   It was the production of events and content that featured elite streetball players through the AND1 Mixtape Tour and the ESPN Streetball television program that catapulted AND1 from a $50 million a year apparel brand, to a $250 million basketball merchandising giant that was second only to NIKE.

### Recreational basketball provides an unlimited well of content.

In 2021, the top three recreational basketball social media platforms combined generated 30 billion video views. If you applied a simple economic value of $0.0025 per to each video view, that’s $75,000,000.00 economic value.  A quick and crude calculation but it helps you understand why one of these leading platforms launched its own professional basketball league.   In 2020, a leading generation z sports media platform launched its own professional basketball league, paying athletes between 16 and 19 years old $100,000.00 a year to play in their league.

Doubling down on the content first business strategy and creating branded basketball content featuring teenagers and young adults.  Essentially carving out its own niche basketball market for elite teenage basketball players.

![The power of recreational basketball ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yYvVIpXpGUHK1w7FWXXr6.png?height=720&width=1280)

### The NBBL Facility Network can unlock value currently latent in black and brown communities across the country through empowering teenagers and young adults with the ability to monetize their participation in the No Backboard Basketball League.  Some examples:

●     A hooper plays in a NBBL tournament.  The videos from that tournament generate $100,000.00 over the next 6 months.  Every time the ad network makes a distribution, the hooper receives a payment to a token automatically into perpetuity.

●     A fan of this same hooper maintains his fan page.  The fan ingests the videos from the tournament into their account on the blockchain-empowered media platform.   The fan rebrands the video for their fan page and mints the remixed video into a NFT.  The fan then uploads NFT into their pages embedded media player to share with their audience.  As the video is monetized, payments are automatically sent to the hoopers, the fan, and the League.

●     Another fan of the hooper coordinates watch parties for games posted to the hooper’s fan page. League incentives their fans to watch games through a watch-to-earn model.  Here, two tokens are in play.  The first is a token that provides access to the content.  The second token is the native currency used on the platform.

### Use a token to incentivize the onboarding of 1 million people into the Web3 economy.

To make the impact in the communities we build facilities requires a commitment to educating our neighbors and fans.

Educating the communities we serve on Web3 technologies; tokenomics, non-fungible tokens, and decentralized finance, is the knowledge transfer required to supercharge the impact of architecting a robust tokenized economy around the No Backboard Basketball League.

To achieve the goal of onboarding 1 million people into Web3, the League and partners will develop a program and track the onboarding of 100,000 people per region.  So, each facility is charged with building a fanbase with that fanbase rolling up to the regional goal of 100,000. Each fan's education is certified via an NFT in their connected wallet.

![Syndicated over the Overtime Network ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/o9HyEoy4zB3LVtmnMlxEH.JPG?height=879&width=541)

## Putting It All Together

The synergy of the NBBL Facility Network, blockchain technologies, and grassroots community outreach to on board 1 million people into the Web3 economy can create, build, and sustain a multi-billion-dollar economy that provides economic opportunity to thousands of teenagers and young adults while making an economic impact in communities across the United States.

Over the next 10 years the League will work to achieve the buildout of the NBBL Facility Network and achieve the following goals:

1. The NBBL Facility Network employs 2,000+ employees.
2. The NBBL Facility Network directly impacts the value of 100,000 residential properties across 100 neighborhoods in the United States.
3. The NBBL Facility Network established a private and exclusive marketplace with over 1,000,000 members.
4. 5,000 teenagers or young adults have leveraged The NBBL Facility Network to build successful businesses and create hundreds of millions of dollars in new wealth.
5. No Backboard Basketball League has a massive global audience of 100 million people who consume content, buy merchandise, and attend events, powering a niche basketball industry.
6. Onboarded over 1 million people into the Web3 economy.

## Where to start? Building a team, a community, and a movement.

The vision is grand and will ultimately cost in the hundreds of millions of dollars to develop and build.  Add the cognitive dissonance people experience thinking of building a business around a no backboard basketball sport, I can comprehend most people’s initial resistance.  However, with blockchain relationships can be structured so that the success of the No Backboard Basketball League can be aligned with the interest of athletes, creators, fans, and entire neighborhoods.

![Group photograph taken after proof-of-concept event](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/uoCTJt-qr0XBrbFJwDCGj.jpg?height=339&width=597)

## Building an Incentivized Community to build the No Backboard Basketball League Facility Network

The idea is to leverage blockchain technologies, crowd-funding, equity-crowdfunding, Decentralized Autonomous Organizations (DAOs), and Government Opportunity Zones to build an incentivized and diverse community of contributors that help the No Backboard Basketball League move from stage to stage in the achievement of the mission.

Crowdfunding, Equity-Crowdfunding, NFTs, DAOs, and Qualified Opportunity Zones are proven, new funding tools that are available to entrepreneurs to create more effective funding campaigns.  Each tool addresses a specific type of funding and can produce impactful results alone.

The plan is to design a multi-year funding strategy that strategically leverages traditional means of debt and equity to raise capital to empower the use of one or more of the funding tools mentioned here at different stages.  Moving the project from one stage to the next while increasing the communities of supporters' ability to share in the League’s economic growth.

The blockchain platform, Ethereum holds the record for the largest amount raised through crowdfunding raising $4.1 Billion.  The video game Star Citizen comes in a distant second, raising $457 Million on Kickstarter.  With a total available of audience of over 2 billion basketball fans, a well-designed, multi-step, multi-year strategy can build the audience and momentum to crowdsource a significant amount of capital to achieve the final object of building the NBBL Facility Network and corresponding blockchain-powered media platform.

![The Opportunity in a nutshell](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/QaXB9sUzIfIta7k0PfBe0.png?height=720&width=1280)

## Three Phases to Building a No Backboard Basketball League Community Economy:

### Awareness, Anchors, and Annexation

Though the ultimate cost of this project is significant, the plan is simple and practical. If momentum can be created by a small group of individuals.  A splash can turn into a tsunami of supporters.

The following outlines the basic go to market and growth plan.  Again, simple, practical, and can be started by a small group of supporters.

### Stage 1:  Awareness - Attention is the Currency of Leadership

***Goal:***  *Build a global audience 1,000,000 social media followers, and an engaged community of 50,000.*

***Objective:***  *Establish revenue streams through the monetization of content,  build an incentivized NFT Community, and build sales channels for branded merchandise.*

![Content Marketing is the lowest barrier to building sustainable revenues to support growth](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/FFtNlINI7XUxTL9wMhAPl.png?height=720&width=1280)

### Stage 2:  Anchors - Availability is the key to Productivity

***Goal:***  *Build 1 to 2 NBBL facilities in each of the 10 selected regions of the United States.*

***Objective:***  *Establish regional destinations for the public to experience a No Backboard Basketball League Facility, establish regional media networks to produce local content that’s distributed globally, and establish a team on the ground community of leaders in each region.*

### Stage 3:  Annexation - Buildout NBBL Facility Network and establish a niched tokenized NBBL economy.

***Goal:***  *Buildout the NBBL Facility Network to one hundred units, integrate robust technology including a blockchain-empowered media platform, a NFT / Token exchange, and a marketplace.  Complete the onboarding of 1,000,000 people into the Web3 economy.*

***Objective:***  *Build a vibrant and dynamic tokenized economy around the NBBL Facility Network that includes tens of thousands of employees, athletes, and businesses serving a global audience of 100 million fans or approximately 5% of the current global basketball fanbase.*

![UHoopers Collection ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/JL5pgDiWf6NFVQ_QUvaOb.jpg?height=1173&width=719)

## UHoopers NFT Collection  - “Hooping for the Soul of Basketball”

### “How do you eat an elephant?  One bite at a time.” - A Proverb

Here’s the first project, the “first bite” of the elephant called the  No Backboard Basketball League effort.  The UHoopers NFT Collections.

UHoopers is an evolving collection with each NFT doubling as a VIP membership in the No Backboard Basketball League UHoopers Social Club.  The Social Club is a community of individuals and organizations that support the mission of the No Backboard Basketball League.

Revenue generated from the initial sale of the UHoops Collection and royalties from the secondary market will fund:

●     The establishment of the first No Backboard Basketball League Facility; Building #0.

●     The establishment of a membership treasury staked to the collection.

●     The production and distribution of Dawn of a New Sport 2022 Mixtape Docuseries.

●     Free NFT AirDrops and Raffles from Dawn of a New Sport 2022 NFT Collections.

●     Development of the UHoopers Collections second iteration:  The Animations Collection and associated utilities.

At the time of this writing, the plan is to crowdfund the production of the Dawn of a New Sport Docuseries  and give supporters a free UHoopers NFT as their claim ticket to receive their collector's edition the docuseries.  The UHoopers NFT also qualifies the holder to receive a Highlight NFT from the docuseries.

Two additional NFT collections will be created from the docuseries content; A photography collection, and a highlight clips collection.  These NFTs will be randomly airdropped to holders of the UHoopers Collection.

Finally, each UHoopers NFT comes with Executive Producers credit for the Dawn of the New Sport 2022 Docuseries for funding the project, and postproduction marketing.  Executive Producers credit will be presented in the video as, “Executive Producer, UHoopers Social Club.”  A portion of all proceeds generated from the monetization of the project will be added to the collections treasury and used to enhance the UHoopers’ membership experience.

Here, the goal is to leverage the docuseries project too:

●     Build a Social Media audience of 1,000,000.

●     Launch and sellout the 10,000 UHoopers NFT collection.

●     Fund establishment of NBBL Facility #0, and business operations for 24 months through the UHoopers NFT collection.

●     Leverage Docuseries into a sponsored online No Backboard Basketball League  show, driving royalties for the UHoopers Social Club.

●     Attract the right team of advisors, partners, contributors, and community of builders.

●     Develop the second iteration of the Uhoopers NFT Collection

![Infographic :  Content Merchandising Strategy   ](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/iNh6-MiGC_UBYeybAtiJi.jpg?height=720&width=1280)

This campaign is in development.  Open to conversations and making connections with web3 developers, media, creators, artist, and of hoopers.  Open to conversations with investors.   At this time, you can connect or follow the #effort of the Uhoopers NFT Collection via Twitter @uhoopersnft

[www.nobackboard.com](http://www.nobackboard.com/)                                                [www.uhoopers.io](http://www.uhoopers.io/)

Owners of this Written NFT have the right to participate in the private mint before the pre-public mint of the UHoopers Sketches Collection .

If owner of this Written NFT participates in the upcoming Dawn of a New Sport 2022  Crowdfunding Campaign and qualifies for a free UHoopers NFT.  Owner receives the to mint of their UHoopers Sketches NFT prior to the airdrop to members of the Dawn of a New Sport  2022 Crowdfunding Campaign.

Funds from this Written NFT will be used to fund the Dawn of a New Sport Crowdfunding Campaign on www.mirror.xyz

## 1. Executive Summary

Project Dark Eye is a multi-phase project with planned launches of multiple NFT collections on Ethereum that form an ecosystem in the virtual world (DEYE-Universe). DEYE token is the utility token for the platform with 70% of the total supply reserved for community rewards.

The Machines is an NFT collection launching in Phase 1. The Machine holders are granted DEYE token rewards daily and guaranteed mint of all subsequent NFT collection sales.

The Commanders is an NFT collection launching in Phase 2. The Commanders is a collection of 10000+ 3D avatars with over 200 traits. Every day, the Commanders grow in stats/traits, and the Commander holders receive random loot from Commander explorations.

The Planets is an NFT collection launching in Phase 2 as one of the Commander exploration loots. All Planets are rewards for Commander holders. The launch also comes with the Base System which is the first utility of the Planets.

The Team has plans or has work in progress on more loot types, more Planet utilities and an immersive experience application.

## 2. DEYE-Universe

> *It is Year 6069. The Masters of Project Dark Eye traveled through Portal P-8371 and landed in this new universe. They abided by the Project Act and named it DEYE-Universe. Within the next 6 earth-months, they discovered the very first planet in DEYE-Universe, and completed the HQ construction and portal establishment there. Now is the time for the next phase.*

DEYE-Universe is the virtual world setting for all the Project Dark Eye experience.

## 3. DEYE Token

DEYE token will be an ERC-20 token on the Ethereum blockchain, with a fixed total supply of 10,000,000,000.

### Reward the Community

DEYE tokens are rewarded to Project Dark Eye NFT holders on a daily basis. 70% of the total supply is allocated for the reward pool.

### Marketplace Transactions

In the Marketplace, users may spend DEYE tokens to buy items from other users and to be part of the experience built by other users.

### Transaction Fee Model

A 5% transaction fee is applied in the Marketplace. 100% of the transaction fees are added to the reward pool.

### Governance

DEYE token allows holders to participate in Governance decisions of the project, using a DAO structure. They can exercise their voting rights on key decisions like roadmap prioritization.

### Liquidity

2% of the total supply is reserved for liquidity management. The team does not plan to provide liquidity for DEYE tokens until the Marketplace launch.

![DEYE Token Allocation](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/m7YT-McQBvPy4nPUjb_hy.png?height=1570&width=2622&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&&size=medium)

## 4. The Machines

The Machines is the first NFT collection to be launched. This collection will be deployed on Ethereum as ERC-721 tokens. This collection is created to benefit our early supporter community. There are a total supply of 1422 Machines across 3 different tiers. The first 300 Machines minted are Gold Machines. The next 1000 Machines minted are Silver Machines. And the remaining Machines minted are Black Machines. All Machines will be sold at 0.03 ETH and our early supporters will be able to mint first.

### Benefits of holding a Machine

* Machine holders are rewarded with DEYE tokens every 24 hours.
  * Gold Machine holders are rewarded with 0.00005% of the remaining reward pool per Gold Machine held every 24 hours.
  * Silver Machine holders are rewarded with 0.00002% of the remaining reward pool per Silver Machine held every 24 hours.
  * Black Machine holders are rewarded with 0.000005% of the remaining reward pool per Black Machine held every 24 hours.
* All 1422 Machines grant holders guaranteed mint of at least one NFTs in all the subsequent projects by Project Dark Eye at a discounted price (or prioritized mint if the total supply is less than 1422). The exact numbers are decided on a per-project basis.
* Exclusive airdrops, giveaways, and events.

![Machine (Unfinalized)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eCbW8hlL4M_8arxHBHsGt.jpg?height=3500&width=3500)

## 5. The Commanders

The Commanders is a collection of 6666 3D avatars deployed on Ethereum as ERC-721 tokens. Each avatar in the collection represents a commander in DEYE-Universe. Each commander will experience different events, grow in different directions and change DEYE-Universe in a unique way.

Every 24 hours, every Commander is dispatched to an exploration, without any operations needed from the owner address. Through each exploration, Commanders gain experience, grow in different traits, and receive loot (items, equipment, planets) from battles and discoveries. On a daily basis, the Commander NFTs have their stats/traits updated and the holders are rewarded with the loot NFTs.

Each Commander has a unique 3D avatar, with 200+ Visual Traits in the whole collection. These Visual Traits only decide the appearance of the Commanders.

All Commanders have the same starting Ability Traits. The Ability Traits grow through daily explorations, and the daily exploration results are impacted by the Ability Traits. Project Dark Eye Team is committed to make it equal across all Commanders in terms of the utility.

Commander NFT holders are also rewarded with a portion of the remaining reward pool every 24 hours. The exact portion number will be announced once the total supply of the Commanders is finalized.

![Commander (Unfinalized)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/YNRoqlydBWYJjbnU8Fd_3.png?height=1233&width=1233)

## 6. The Planets

Planet is the “Land” equivalent in DEYE-Universe. Planet #0 is where the Project Dark Eye HQ is at and is owned by Project Dark Eye Team. 100% of the remaining Planet supply will be rewarded to the Commander holders through Commander explorations.

Each Commander has one base in one of the discovered DEYE-Universe planets. The base is where the Commander is dispatched from on daily explorations. Explorations dispatched from Planets closer to the undiscovered space in DEYE-Universe have a high chance of discovering new Planets and receiving new loot. All Commanders have base on Planet #0 at the beginning. Through the platform on our website, Planet holders are able to enable/disable their planets for re-base at a price they set, and Commander holders are able to re-base each of their Commanders to a re-base-enabled planet at the price set.

Planets have built-in utilities and customizable utilities. Base System is one of the built-in utilities. More utilities will be announced from the team.

![Planet (Unfinalized)](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6NPriolf-ExdlhoOh54ix.jpg?height=1440&width=2560)

## 7. The Marketplace

There are going to be more types of loot (other than Planets) that Commander holders will receive through Commander explorations. The Marketplace will launch on our website for trading all types of loot using DEYE token. More details will be announced in the next version of the whitepaper.

## 8. The World by Project Dark Eye

The goal of this working title is to provide an immersive social experience not only for the existing NFT holders but also to the broader social media consumers. Crypto will not be a barrier for anyone to experience the World, to create personal experience, or to access any social features, but it will be the way to trade items and to trade experience. All the existing holders will get a head start in this metaverse. The first application will be an Unreal Engine PC application. Development is currently underway.

## 9. Timeline

### Phase 1 (2022 April)

* The Machines collection and the DEYE token are deployed.
* As soon as a Machine is minted, its daily DEYE token reward starts.
* The Machine holders are able to check DEYE balance and claim DEYE tokens from the website (with only gas fee).

### Phase 2 (2022 May/June)

* The Commanders collection is deployed.
* As soon as a Commander is minted, its daily DEYE token reward starts.
* Right after the Commanders minting is completed,
  * The Commander exploration starts on a daily basis. This means that the Commander holders start to receive Planets from explorations. The Commander holders are able to claim the loot NFTs from the website (with only gas fee).
  * Planet Base System launches. Planet holders are able to enable/disable the rebase feature on their planets and set a price for Commanders to rebase to the planet (with only gas fee). Commander holders are able to rebase each of their Commanders onto another discovered Planet that has the rebase feature enabled, at a price set by Planet holder (plus gas fee).

### Phase 3 (2022 June/July)

* More loot items become available to claim from explorations.
* More Planet utilities are available.
* The Marketplace launches.
* More details on Phase 3 will be revealed in the next version of the whitepaper.

### Phase 4 (2022 H2)

* The World V1 alpha testing launches. More details will be revealed in a future version of the whitepaper.

# 10. A Personal Note

I am Mas. As a founder of the project, I have always been passionate about building the very best consumer experience with innovations and leverages on the latest technology. Being in the tech world for a decade in the silicon valley, I started as a software engineer at Google where I helped build a planet-scale security platform for Google’s enterprise clients. I left Google in a few years with the mindset to change the consumer world, to build something that every single individual could enjoy. I joined as a founding engineer in a tech startup and helped build a hundreds-of-millions-of-dollar business in the space of consumer online shopping experience. Over the last few years, I have been amazed by the Crypto/NFT community, excited by the possibilities of the Web3 technologies while at the same time seeing a lack of technical capabilities in many projects. So here I am now. In 2021, I started on Project Dark Eye, with the vision to innovate, to create, to explore all the possibilities in this space with the community.

I want to personally thank you all, the community, the team and all the people around, for the support and for everything. It has been an incredible journey!

## Official Links

* Website: [ProjectDarkEye.com](https://projectdarkeye.com)
* Twitter: [@ProjectDarkEye](http://twitter.com/ProjectDarkEye)
* Discord: [discord.gg/sMuCeRFPjv](https://t.co/0e8UvJJ1AY)

title: zk 学习笔记
body:
> 对 zk Talk 第一期《隐私型的扩容解决方案-零知识证明(1)》的一部分记录：
>
> [https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1LyxBoakdROKN?s=20](https://twitter.com/i/spaces/1LyxBoakdROKN?s=20)


## 零知识证明和 zkSNARKs

“checking without understanding“。一方（prover）向另一方（verifier）证明一个命题为真，但 verifier 除了知道该命题为真以外并没有增加任何其他的知识。

在区块链领域内的应用：

* 隐私
* 扩容

## zkSNARKs

**Z**ero-**K**nowledge **S**uccinct **N**on-Interactive **AR**gument of **K**nowledge

* 零知识
* 简洁
* 非交互式
* 证明

### 零知识

“知识”在数学上是有非常良好的定义的。但“零知识”不是“零信息”的，因为要至少传递一些 01 串的信息给对方。零知识本质上在于熵很大，都是很随机的信息，无法从中提取出有用的知识。

### 简洁

“简洁”的证明尺寸是 sublinear 的。简洁对于验证非常重要，对于区块链尤为重要，因为链上成本和考虑到其他节点容易接收等。

### 非交互式

* 交互式证明：
  * 最早是需要反复“问答”来确认证明者拥有某项知识
  * 最早 Goldwasser、Micali、Rackoff 在 1985 年提出“The Knowledge of Complexity of Interactive Proof Systems”
* 非交互式证明
  * 1987 年，NIZK（非交互式零知识证明），避免反复问答来确认。实现方式包括：
    * 可以引入一个第三方采用“随机预言机”
    * 也可以用 CRS（Common Reference String，公共参考串）
  * CRS 相当于是给完全没有信任基础的双方一点点信任基础（Trusted Setup）

### 证明

零知识证明里的证明（proof），其实一般多指的是“argument”。因为 argument 和 proof 的区别是

* proof 没有任何限制条件；而 argument 在多项式时间内可以完成的计算，而且体积比较小
* 另一个区别是在安全性上
  * 安全性上有两个对抗性的属性：可靠性、零知识
  * argument 倾向于零知识（所以也不用担心未来超级计算机去破解）

### zkSNARKs vs SNARKs

也可以单独说 “SNARKs”。zkSNARKs 和 SNARKs 的算法几乎差不多，可能 80% - 90% 都是一样的，只是一些关键步骤可能不一样，两者之间不是竞争关系。主要区别是：

* zkSNARKs 加上了隐私
* SNARKs 更多只是关注于压缩，而不关心计算的数据是否是隐私的

## 一些重要的里程碑

* 1985 提出交互式零知识证明
* 85 年 - 92 年
  * 计算理论发展很快，很多重要理论都是在这个阶段，例如 argument 等。因为零知识证明其实和计算复杂度理论的关系比密码学的关系更大
  * 这段时间也提出了非交互式零知识证明（NIZK）
  * 最早的 SNARK 的定义也在 92 年提出
* 92 年 - 02 年
  * 基于 CRS 的非交互式零知识证明：多方共同约定一串数，给完全没有信任的基础一点点信任基础。其他的的实现方式还包括 Random Oracle、PCP 等
  * Schnorr 协议，很多零知识证明最早的起点
  * Cramer 和 Damgard（CD98）引入算术电路，用算术电路做零知识证明。即把常见的运算转换为零知识证明，之后就可以和写程序绑定在一起
* 02 年 - 10 年
  * 02、03 年左右， Dan Boneh 提出基于椭圆曲线的双线性配对（ECC pairing）椭圆曲线上和乘法相关的一些构造
  * Groth10，可以用 很短的 proof size 来构造零知识证明（之前要一个证明要大概几个G）
* 10 年之后
  * GGPR13，论证了很多零知识证明可用，并且提供了一个 libsnark 的库（两年前直接业界基本都会用的一个库；现在不太维护，业界主要都切换为 rust）
  * ZCash 第一个区块链领域内的零知识应用，基于2014 的论文和 libsnark，2015年就实现上线
  * 接下来，零知识证明社区和区块链世界开始结合，一直延续到2017-2018年
  * 从2018年到现在，很多算法开始合流

## 当前常见算法

当前主要的两类算法：

* PLONK
* zkSTARK

其他还包括 Marlin（Aleo）等，但和 Plonk 区别不是太大

### Halo

Halo 比较受关注，不需要 trusted setup。Halo 主要基于5个前置的工作：

* 和 bulletproof 关系很大
* 一种递归分摊的工作，解决递归零知识证明的工作
* 多项式承诺（KZG 10），零知识证明的操作抽象成同一个接口，有非常简洁的接口
* STARK，StarkWare 的创始人最早对虚拟机做零知识证明的（可以看作是非常早期的 zkEVM），两个曲线可以互相嵌入
* Plonk，Aztec 团队发明的

### zkSTARK

**S**calable **T**ransparent。其中 S 不是简洁，因为一开始做不到，因此更多宣传其 Trusted Setup 的特点。

但 STARKs 其实也需要一个 uniformly-random string。

对 STARK 其实也没有像 SNARK 的学术定义，一般指的是 StarkWare 研发的算法。

Proof 最早可能比较大，但经过了多轮的迭代，目前也可以做到简洁。

## Trusted Setup

以往学术界不太重视（不认为是一个大问题），但随着业界实用需求增长，也在被研究。Trusted Setup 目前不是大问题，因为：

* Setup Ceremony 参与范围广，例如任何人都可以在 github 上提交，而且是永续的方式来提交。只要一个人感觉目前的随机数不安全，都可以再不断提交
* 不过 trusted setup 的 proof size 会更小
* 也可以把生成的过程用 MPC 的方式来解决

title: Espresso 交互教程
body:
## 项目背景：

Espresso目的是建立一个可扩展的web3隐私解决方案,目前由红杉资本领投$3200W。现在还处于非常早期阶段，值得一做。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/l0raK9RlDn-alaJmTj4u-.png?height=714&width=1270)

贴上官方的全英文教程，英文没问题的可以参考，很详细

[https://docs.cape.tech/espresso-systems/cape-user-guide/getting-started](https://docs.cape.tech/espresso-systems/cape-user-guide/getting-started)

如果英文阅读不方便，参考本教程也没问题

### 本次教程需要搭建VMware虚拟机环境，并安装ubuntu

推荐用腾讯的软件中心下载VMware，因为官网在国外，下载速度很慢。

[腾讯软件中心](https://pc.qq.com/detail/0/detail_21600.html)

下载完成后，按照文章安装搭建步骤很详细。文章是两年前的文章，VMware版本还是14，现在是16，都是一样安装。

没有ubuntu镜像的话，这里下载

[https://mirror.nju.edu.cn/ubuntu-releases/20.04.4/](https://mirror.nju.edu.cn/ubuntu-releases/20.04.4/)

[虚拟机安装教程](https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/141033713)

搭建好虚拟机和系统后，再安装Docker

[docker安装教程](https://kalacloud.com/blog/how-to-install-and-use-docker-on-ubuntu)

docker成功安装之后，执行

`docker-compose pull`

如果报错：docker-compose 命令不存在，则进行安装

`sudo apt install docker-compose`

安装完成继续执行

`sudo docker-compose pull`

按Y等待安装完成，接着执行

`sudo docker-compose up`

出现如下结果，则为成功

![钱包运行成功](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bBBzf4eVDSkkprfBPS0gP.png?height=720&width=1748)

现在可以在浏览器内URL栏打开：localhost，就能看到钱包在运行

![钱包启动界面](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/yQ0VYDoH2Zg1Z5rSq6Oj7.png?height=658&width=1279)

至此，前期准备工作全部完成，开始真正的测试：

**1.设置新钱包**

![新钱包](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/g2r-KDZzXg7vKbo3fRM3y.png?height=641&width=1279)

2\.点击“**reveal keys**”保存助记词，将自己的助记词妥善保存，之后可用于恢复钱包

**3.命名钱包恢复文件**

![命名](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nEhXp14VUvXlFZAngHlBu.png?height=885&width=1275)

**4.设置钱包密码**

![设置密码](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/rREZ8igEvKu19tFjIPGzf.png?height=879&width=1278)

**5.创建钱包**

![创建钱包](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/PO0tdY9c5xpoiAphL1iTL.png?height=856&width=1261)

**6.领取测试代币**

![领取测试币](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dEDUXCNKz7F2Q6BKAGaph.png?height=885&width=1290)

**7.回到首页，连接钱包，注意要切换到goerli链**

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i2JIc0xvmnT1I4mz38aox.png?height=1025&width=1276)

由于本次使用虚拟机安装Ubuntu进行测试，浏览器没有小狐狸钱包，所以使用手机钱包(本人手机钱包为TP钱包)进行连接，效果一样。不过首先得添加goerli链，和电脑上大致相同，钱包内打开[Chainlist](https://chainlist.info/)，搜索goerli添加上即可。

或者直接在浏览器里安装小狐狸然后倒入助记词也是可以的。

![手机连接钱包](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/GtWyiknamWG9jfKrZcbLa.jpg?height=2532&width=1170)

**8.到“Account”页面生成一个新钱包地址**

![新地址](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2RP_HxiiVnfTlcXfH10vC.png?height=790&width=1546)

**9.发送一些代币到新钱包地址**

![发送代币](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/UOdJkW4Man-VlHfDQFmN6.png?height=938&width=1521)

**10.创建新的ERC-20资产**

![添加新资产](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/dyAbUp-X4RN6T146Ez4Mh.png?height=888&width=1541)

goerli有余额的代币合约，可以去[ethscaner](https://goerli.etherscan.io/)里搜索自己钱包，然后查看有余额的代币，图中所示就是你钱包里的代币余额。选取第一个然后复制代币合约填入上述页面即可。

![代币余额](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/LSyBGkCk9oPWRAve9QGcW.png?height=1199&width=2334)

填入第一个代币ATOM的合约地址

![添加合约](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vTL6XbuU6eOPUkTcjrTsW.png?height=1014&width=1532)

往下拉，我们会看到还有两个信息需要填写

![两个key](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/3m8Aj6td1I3uBfWgD80o8.png?height=1017&width=1516)

一个是**viewing key**，另一个**freezing key，**这俩信息需要在“**Account**”页面生成

![viewing key](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/i85P34hRv3tQsvUNvd0gP.png?height=694&width=1570)

![freezing key](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/s0duekPz3H2VeBP1YA-sg.png?height=743&width=1577)

然后将这俩key保存，并填入到刚才的资产页面，注意选项都勾选上，然后点击创建。需要等待几分钟

![填入key](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/VnvCSgsqHG7Tua54-2wjj.png?height=1024&width=1600)

其实如果不需要在“资产查看密钥”和“资产冻结密钥”部分选择启用查看交易金额和交易地址，以及启用该资产类型的交易冻结。可以不用勾选后面选项也可以生成新资产。

![新资产](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/eQQdFULy5IF5cJlkKP5Es.png?height=1114&width=1700)

查看新的资产信息

![新资产信息](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Q0ESgABII3uDEA6UwOrJc.png?height=1141&width=1835)

**11.导出或导入新的资产**

但你自己创建了一个新的资产时，你可以导出资产信息方便别人导入；当你想看到他人的资产信息时，直接导入他人资产的信息即可；

![导入导出资产信息](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/TSHXlhGMpGCOJIWBqL52o.png?height=1121&width=2015)

**12.Wrap和Unwrap资产**

找到目标资产进行操作即可。但测试中授权一直没成功，后续再看

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/6bkFyMriQ59okURi-KNbF.png?height=1193&width=1752)

测试到此结束，可以去填写新生成的资产表单，说不定有福报

[https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdE5pcHcq9lTHj7yGPIJK3YIcQKL1wtwZmws3rc20icYi8gLQ/viewform](https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSdE5pcHcq9lTHj7yGPIJK3YIcQKL1wtwZmws3rc20icYi8gLQ/viewform)

官推

[https://twitter.com/EspressoSys](https://twitter.com/EspressoSys)

官网

[https://www.espressosys.com/](https://www.espressosys.com/)

如果觉得教程还不错，欢迎关注本人推特

[https://twitter.com/hiweigr](https://twitter.com/hiweigr)

title: 银河Arbitrum Odyssey活动攻略2—— GMX和Yield Protocol
body:
奥德赛第二周活动开始啦！第一周跨链周总共发生257942笔ETH跨链交易，总计跨链44014.8 ETH，Hop Protocol是跨链钱包地址数最多的桥。太卷了！

计算了下，第二周活动单号准备75u（gas和质押的，gas消耗6-7u一个号）左右即可做一个号，依然会很卷。

## 任务1  GMX（注意是完成3项任务）

**任务gas消耗及质押金额：**

1\.4笔gas总消耗约5.5U.

2\.第二步至少质押10u

3\.所以，20u一个号没问题。

**任务教程：**

1\.进入活动指导网址，如图所示。链接如下：

[https://galaxy.eco/credential/3254](https://galaxy.eco/credential/3254)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cosVD0IllE4tk7_Sv5mF_.png?height=801&width=1817)

2\.点击图上序号1的链接进入如下界面。点击Connect Wallet，连接小狐狸钱包。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2pd-xJC_PVVpT8JPUdADp.png?height=838&width=1872)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ggy0TxB06vugdfzvTGKO2.png?height=857&width=1820)

3\.输入开多的金额（大于10u即可），下面拉选杠杆倍数，点击Enable Leverage启用杠杆，跳出小狐狸点确认即可。（gas消耗1.81u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bG53Zz3cEzmYzNmLGrHj3.png?height=820&width=1842)

4\.点击Long ETH。跳出确认界面点击Long。跳出小狐狸钱包后点确认。（gas消耗1.81u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kKocKaNMQCw28YZLcM2XQ.png?height=847&width=1840)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/I9uDjVLuCNicToQupWayO.png?height=733&width=827)

5\.如图正在打包，打包完毕后即完成开多。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pK58OxCDX2rEtdct9h553.png?height=816&width=1341)

6\.随后点击Close，解除杠杆。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hFmPcmiRNYEZh4dQN0FZQ.png?height=776&width=1016)

7\.回到活动界面点击序号2的链接。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OgNjRC-HXh495MsOJmza3.png?height=801&width=1817)

8\.进入GLP的界面后如图输入购买金额（GLP要是整数，金额大于10u），点击Buy GLP 。在小狐狸中确认。（gas消耗1.12u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Y8VoSoSszDrDz6Du-3i7D.png?height=826&width=1858)

8\.回到活动界面点击序号3的链接。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0u9c7TQ9e1FNp6dR95Uuy.png?height=801&width=1817)

9\.进入如图所示swap界面，Pay那一栏输入大于10u的金额，点击Aprrove后点击swap。（gas消耗0.76u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1JgaA4VzyjMJA09v9GhTo.png?height=817&width=1884)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M0zIR7U-HdS3G9MiEHcPK.png?height=832&width=1845)

10\.GMX任务完成，暂时不要解除GLP，等活动快照后，在银河官网领取NFT。

[https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCsqgUtsTX](https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCsqgUtsTX)

## 任务2  Yield Protocol（注意3个任务只要选一个做就可以）未发币项目！！！

**任务gas消耗及质押金额：**

任务1：gas消耗1.43u，至少质押50u。

任务2：gas消耗1.20u，至少借出50u。

任务3：gas消耗0.92u，准备0.176ETH（约193u）抵押最安全。

所以，如果单纯为了奥德赛，建议在任务1或任务2中选一个做，如果是为了空投，都做了吧。

**任务教程：**

1\.进入活动指导页。如图所示，链接如下：

[https://galaxy.eco/credential/3253](https://galaxy.eco/credential/3253)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wR6q1XUIXwc8U3zImvwRQ.png?height=794&width=1689)

2\.**任务1，**点击上图序号1中的链接，进入pool界面。输入55（大于50u即可），点击Next Step。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qYmGW3hzYF2c0w1fT4pR1.png?height=849&width=1608)

3\.打勾，点击pool 55 usdc。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nvGc9Gq1qCN0fOwjYPfkn.png?height=856&width=1582)

4\.跳出小狐狸钱包后签名。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AxiPnV3N4Qw9M723YRba0.png?height=928&width=1851)

5\.随后点击确认。（gas消耗1.43U）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4Pxhu82ksAgJ3qb_2qpSk.png?height=867&width=1893)

6\.出现红框中内容即加池子完毕。（我之前加过，所以是152。）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NVTtSmRXLq_5jUnJBlQTv.png?height=723&width=1399)

7\.**任务2，**回到活动指导页，点击序号2的链接，进入lend界面。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BzRdSxLfm2re8wwEp1rga.png?height=794&width=1689)

8\.选USDC，输入55（大于50u即可），点一下0.62那个框变成橙色，点击Next Step。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/atgJTJ76A3P5n1MrFowzE.png?height=835&width=1860)

9\.点击Lend 55 USDC。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aAummvCR6xr-SsiJY2MQ2.png?height=841&width=1842)

10\.点击签名，随后点击确认。（gas消耗1.2u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AI-5ZMGeETcvL6QN9ZtDu.png?height=832&width=1857)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vV1b-swXztuiRtnxc-C0M.png?height=823&width=1846)

11\.如图所示即lend完毕。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NJsC2fbbq6DmrJhNfkMC8.png?height=843&width=1600)

12\.**任务3**回到活动指导页，点击序号3的链接，进入borrow界面。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mWrdYB0I2ErygQb5Uddt7.png?height=794&width=1689)

13\.输入101USDC(大于100u即可)，点一下1.11那个变橙色，点击Next Step。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KPKiL55yBDU6y7OHVGVbm.png?height=847&width=1627)

14\.在框内输入数额，比下面提示的安全数额略大最好，点击Next Step。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lENHTLu_mr3XGHzsSYgWC.png?height=850&width=1480)

15\.打勾，点击Borrow 101 USDC。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lbBa4OG_znBw5uGliPrGP.png?height=856&width=1521)

16\.点击确认。（gas消耗0.92u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Rvod3BtwL3Vgw9yEOK0Kr.png?height=834&width=1852)

17\.出现如图所示即可。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A62Nfp_hAvjb406JV_86W.png?height=837&width=1579)

活动结束后，在银河领取NFT。

[https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCaigUt9HD](https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCaigUt9HD)

关于活动更多信息，请关注我的推特中的奥德赛活动主题帖！

[https://twitter.com/Greta0086/status/1538182316480028672?s=20&t=J7ysd-VYRL6qxY3Mpxhwbg](https://twitter.com/Greta0086/status/1538182316480028672?s=20&t=J7ysd-VYRL6qxY3Mpxhwbg)

title: My First Crypto Event | NFT NYC recap
body:
## The sense of belonging in this community is incredibly powerful


---

Right before [NFT NYC](https://www.nft.nyc/) (June 20–23), I was in Las Vegas attending a [Snowflake](https://www.snowflake.com/) Conference where engineers and business leaders talked about the latest technology in the data field and how data empowers great business … the normal tech conference that you would expect.

### It’s a totally different world in NFT NYC.

The power of community is just at another level. In addition to NFT natives and collectors, there was also a good mix of engineers, and business owners. However, the vibe is completely different from the stereotypical tech world. Everyone is so excited about the future community development, the new grads are more willing to join a Web3 company, and the business owners are seeking opportunities to break into cutting-edge products and new services.

Can you imagine tens of thousands of people sharing the same passion and all gathered in NYC to meet up with their fellow nft holders at the IRL parties, explore the latest ideas that people are building in the space, and wonder what the future is like in the web3 world ...

![Main Conference](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/IKoUIgABcABTTFjJrvEgu.JPG?height=4032&width=3024)

For disclosure, I purchased the ticket for the main conference but I ended up only going there for one afternoon checking out the booth, and didn’t sit in any sessions. (😥 such a waste of money)


---

#### TBH, it feels like a super ultra networking event but with more fun!

The satellite events were giving the actual life to the NFT NYC week. I was basically hopping from one social event to another networking dinner and then to another party since Monday night.

Here are a couple of **highlights** of my week:

1. Rooftop Party hosted by [OP Crypto](https://www.opcrypto.vc/) and [MonkeDAO](https://twitter.com/monkedao/?lang=en) — great drinks, met awesome builders on Solona
2. N(YC)FT hosted by several VCs — made connections with insightful investors in the space
3. **[Azuki](https://www.azuki.com/garden) Party — BEST EVENT OF THE WEEK! ❤️**
4. Phantom Project After Party — enjoyed the live performance of Rich Brian

Kudos to all the event hosts for creating the positive energy 🚀🚀🚀

#### Azuki Party Recap

* The most well-organized event during the week
* Felt like I was in Japan with the sakura trees, street food booth, and claw machines for the beans
* Special Performance from Zhu 🔥

[https://twitter.com/euNice_Bolt/status/1540000887275397121?s=20&t=2-z4asG3w4tmodnvnTEzYg](https://twitter.com/euNice_Bolt/status/1540000887275397121?s=20&t=2-z4asG3w4tmodnvnTEzYg)

![Networking event in a restaurant built on a boat](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Qkc0R1Pta1xZSjOH5qw_X.png?height=1250&width=800)

![After Party featuring Rich Brian](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4Z5wjgczU8EIm35L2H0Y4.JPG?height=4032&width=3024)


---

### Well, let’s talk about the real business.

The fact that people are throwing parties and having a good time at NFT NYC doesn’t mean that the crypto world is perfect, or that the bear market has no impact. While I cannot speak for others, IMO the correction in the market is inevitable because of people’s irrational greed, but it actually creates an opportunity for builders who are willing to develop great products.

With all the rug pulls and scams happening in the space, it is going to be a long way for people to regain their trust and for mass adoption of NFT to happen. If more projects are built on unrealistic promises and not on real utility or feasible action items to create value for the community, they are essentially ruining the blueprint of the Web3 world. The highly digital, immersively social, technologically advanced metaverse might never come.

Crypto and NFT brought creative ways for people to make a fortune, quickly. However, the real question is — **how many people are willing to dedicate the hard work and effort to build an ideal Web3 world when all the hype is gone?**


---

TIL, and I want to share with everyone:

#### Always be responsible and never be not responsible.


---

Think. Build. Repeat.

Together.

title: 银河Arbitrum Odyssey活动攻略2—— GMX和Yield Protocol
body:
奥德赛第二周活动开始啦！第一周跨链周总共发生257942笔ETH跨链交易，总计跨链44014.8 ETH，Hop Protocol是跨链钱包地址数最多的桥。太卷了！

计算了下，第二周活动单号准备75u（gas和质押的，gas消耗6-7u一个号）左右即可做一个号，依然会很卷。

## 任务1  GMX（注意是完成3项任务）

**任务gas消耗及质押金额：**

1\.4笔gas总消耗约5.5U.

2\.第二步至少质押10u

3\.所以，20u一个号没问题。

**任务教程：**

1\.进入活动指导网址，如图所示。链接如下：

[https://galaxy.eco/credential/3254](https://galaxy.eco/credential/3254)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/cosVD0IllE4tk7_Sv5mF_.png?height=801&width=1817)

2\.点击图上序号1的链接进入如下界面。点击Connect Wallet，连接小狐狸钱包。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/2pd-xJC_PVVpT8JPUdADp.png?height=838&width=1872)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Ggy0TxB06vugdfzvTGKO2.png?height=857&width=1820)

3\.输入开多的金额（大于10u即可），下面拉选杠杆倍数，点击Enable Leverage启用杠杆，跳出小狐狸点确认即可。（gas消耗1.81u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/bG53Zz3cEzmYzNmLGrHj3.png?height=820&width=1842)

4\.点击Long ETH。跳出确认界面点击Long。跳出小狐狸钱包后点确认。（gas消耗1.81u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/kKocKaNMQCw28YZLcM2XQ.png?height=847&width=1840)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/I9uDjVLuCNicToQupWayO.png?height=733&width=827)

5\.如图正在打包，打包完毕后即完成开多。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/pK58OxCDX2rEtdct9h553.png?height=816&width=1341)

6\.随后点击Close，解除杠杆。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/hFmPcmiRNYEZh4dQN0FZQ.png?height=776&width=1016)

7\.回到活动界面点击序号2的链接。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/OgNjRC-HXh495MsOJmza3.png?height=801&width=1817)

8\.进入GLP的界面后如图输入购买金额（GLP要是整数，金额大于10u），点击Buy GLP 。在小狐狸中确认。（gas消耗1.12u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Y8VoSoSszDrDz6Du-3i7D.png?height=826&width=1858)

8\.回到活动界面点击序号3的链接。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/0u9c7TQ9e1FNp6dR95Uuy.png?height=801&width=1817)

9\.进入如图所示swap界面，Pay那一栏输入大于10u的金额，点击Aprrove后点击swap。（gas消耗0.76u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/1JgaA4VzyjMJA09v9GhTo.png?height=817&width=1884)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/M0zIR7U-HdS3G9MiEHcPK.png?height=832&width=1845)

10\.GMX任务完成，暂时不要解除GLP，等活动快照后，在银河官网领取NFT。

[https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCsqgUtsTX](https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCsqgUtsTX)

## 任务2  Yield Protocol（注意3个任务只要选一个做就可以）未发币项目！！！

**任务gas消耗及质押金额：**

任务1：gas消耗1.43u，至少质押50u。

任务2：gas消耗1.20u，至少借出50u。

任务3：gas消耗0.92u，准备0.176ETH（约193u）抵押最安全。

**任务教程：**

1\.进入活动指导页。如图所示，链接如下：

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/wR6q1XUIXwc8U3zImvwRQ.png?height=794&width=1689)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/qYmGW3hzYF2c0w1fT4pR1.png?height=849&width=1608)

3\.打勾，点击pool 55 usdc。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/nvGc9Gq1qCN0fOwjYPfkn.png?height=856&width=1582)

4\.跳出小狐狸钱包后签名。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AxiPnV3N4Qw9M723YRba0.png?height=928&width=1851)

5\.随后点击确认。（gas消耗1.43U）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/4Pxhu82ksAgJ3qb_2qpSk.png?height=867&width=1893)

6\.出现红框中内容即加池子完毕。（我之前加过，所以是152。）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NVTtSmRXLq_5jUnJBlQTv.png?height=723&width=1399)

7\.\*\*任务2，\*\*回到活动指导页，点击序号2的链接，进入lend界面。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/BzRdSxLfm2re8wwEp1rga.png?height=794&width=1689)

8\.选USDC，输入55（大于50u即可），点一下0.62那个框变成橙色，点击Next Step。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/atgJTJ76A3P5n1MrFowzE.png?height=835&width=1860)

9\.点击Lend 55 USDC。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/aAummvCR6xr-SsiJY2MQ2.png?height=841&width=1842)

10\.点击签名，随后点击确认。（gas消耗1.2u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/AI-5ZMGeETcvL6QN9ZtDu.png?height=832&width=1857)

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/vV1b-swXztuiRtnxc-C0M.png?height=823&width=1846)

11\.如图所示即lend完毕。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/NJsC2fbbq6DmrJhNfkMC8.png?height=843&width=1600)

12\.**任务3**回到活动指导页，点击序号3的链接，进入borrow界面。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/mWrdYB0I2ErygQb5Uddt7.png?height=794&width=1689)

13\.输入101USDC(大于100u即可)，点一下1.11那个变橙色，点击Next Step。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KPKiL55yBDU6y7OHVGVbm.png?height=847&width=1627)

14\.在框内输入数额，比下面提示的安全数额略大最好，点击Next Step。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lENHTLu_mr3XGHzsSYgWC.png?height=850&width=1480)

15\.打勾，点击Borrow 101 USDC。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/lbBa4OG_znBw5uGliPrGP.png?height=856&width=1521)

16\.点击确认。（gas消耗0.92u）

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/Rvod3BtwL3Vgw9yEOK0Kr.png?height=834&width=1852)

17\.出现如图所示即可。

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/A62Nfp_hAvjb406JV_86W.png?height=837&width=1579)

活动结束后，在银河领取NFT。

[https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCaigUt9HD](https://galaxy.eco/arbitrum/campaign/GCaigUt9HD)

关于活动更多信息，请关注我的推特中的奥德赛活动主题帖！

![](https://images.mirror-media.xyz/publication-images/KPKiL55yBDU6y7OHVGVbm.png?height=847&width=1627)
